Package noppes.npcs.api.entity

Interface IMob<T extends Mob>

All Superinterfaces:
IEntity<T>, IEntityLiving<T>
All Known Subinterfaces:
IAnimal<T>, ICustomNpc<T>, IMonster<T>, IPixelmon<T>, IVillager<T>
public interface IMob<T extends Mob> extends IEntityLiving<T>

Represents a mob.

Prior to 1.16.5-14Nov21snapshot, this interface is named IEntityLiving. It is renamed as net.minecraft.entity.EntityLiving is refactored to net.minecraft.entity.MobEntity (now refactored to Mob.)

Prior to 1.8.9(29oct16), the interface is not generic.

  • Method Details

    • isNavigating

      boolean isNavigating()

      Gets whether the mob is navigating.

      Returns:
      Whether the mob is navigating.

    • clearNavigation

      void clearNavigation()

      Stops the current navigation on the mob.

      Does nothing if the mob is not navigating.

    • navigateTo

      void navigateTo(double x, double y, double z, double speed)

      Starts the navigation towards a target position.

      The current navigation is stopped if present.

      Parameters:
      x - The X coordinate of the target position.
      y - The Y coordinate of the target position.
      z - The Z coordinate of the target position.
      speed - The speed multiplier.

      The movement speed during the navigation is modified to the generic.movement_speed attribute value of the mob multiplied by the value of speed parameter.

    • jump

      void jump()

      Makes the mob jump.

      Since:
      1.10.2(21jul17)

    • getMCEntity

      T getMCEntity()
      Expert users only
      Specified by:

      Specified by:
      getMCEntity in interface IEntityLiving<T extends Mob>
      Returns:
      Returns minecrafts entity

    • getNavigationPath

      IPos getNavigationPath()

      Gets the destination position of the current navigation.

      The destination position may be a position different from, yet nearby, the target position specified in a navigateTo(double,double,double,double) call.

      Returns:
      The destination position of the current navigation, or null if the mob is not navigating or there is no destination position.
      Since:
      1.12.2_05Jan19snapshot
